      • averageSlicesForEachPixel

        public static double[] averageSlicesForEachPixel(double[] data)
        This takes a data array (of length pixels * roi) and returns an array(length = roi) in which each entry is the average over all the values of the other pixels in that slice.
        Parameters:
        data - array of length pixels*region of interest
        Returns:
        an array of length roi containing the slice averages

      • breadthFirstSearch

        public static ArrayList<PixelSet> breadthFirstSearch(PixelSet showerPixel)
        Finds all unconnected sets of pixel in the showerPixel List and returns a list of lists. Each list containing one separate set. Does a BFs search. See the wikipedia article on BFS. This version is not as memory efficient as it could be.
        Parameters:
        showerPixel - the list to search in
        Returns:
        A list of lists.

      • arrayToList

        public static ArrayList<Integer> arrayToList(int[] a)
        make an Array of the type int[] into ArrayList. We need this because there is no autoboxing between Integer and int types hence Arrays.aslist cannot be used for this conversion

      • toDoubleArray

        public static double[] toDoubleArray(Serializable arr)
        This is method might be useful for getting stuff from the data items and, if possible, cast it into a double array. This is not very fast. And its also very ugly. But thats okay. I still like you
        Parameters:
        arr -
        Returns:
        can be null!

      • mapContainsKeys

        public static void mapContainsKeys(stream.Data item,
                                   String... keys)
        This is a helper method which checks if all the keys provided are in the data item. If one of the keys is not in the item a RuntimeException will be thrown containing a message detailing which processor is causing the error
        Parameters:
        item -
        keys -

      • mapContainsKeys

                                   Collection<String> keys)

        Parameters:

        keys -

      • isKeyValid

        public static void isKeyValid(stream.Data item,
                              String key,
                              Class<?> type)
        This method tries to find the key in the data item and tries to cast them into the type given by the type parameter. If it fails it will throw a RuntimeException with a message containing information about the error.
        Parameters:
        item -
        key -
        type -

      • transformToEllipseCoordinates

        public static double[] transformToEllipseCoordinates(double x,
                                                     double y,
                                                     double cogX,
                                                     double cogY,
                                                     double delta)
        Transforms camera coordinates (x, y) into longitudinal and transversal ellipse coordinates (l, t). The ellipse coordinate system is defined by the center of gravity (x,y) and the angle between the major axis and the camera x-axis (delta in radians).
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        cogX -
        cogY -
        delta -
        Returns:
        an array having two elements {l, t}
